original_query: SELECT MIN(ph.Id) FROM postHistory as ph, posts as p, users as u WHERE p.OwnerUserId = u.Id AND ph.UserId = u.Id AND ph.CreationDate>=CAST('2011-05-20 18:43:03' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.FavoriteCount<=5 AND u.Views>=0 AND u.UpVotes>=0 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-11-27 21:46:49' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-18 13:00:22' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2011-05-20 18:43:03'

CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Views >= 0 AND users.UpVotes >= 0 AND (CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-11-27 21:46:49' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-18 13:00:22')
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.FavoriteCount <= 5
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E2 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E3.Id=E2.OwnerUserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3E2 WHERE E1.UserId=E3E2.Id)
